lines.text:
[Having used Moose's own ankle sidearm against him by twisting it round to shoot Moose dead while it was still attached to his leg]
Thanks for the advice Moose
Looks like We"re dealing with "A Gang In Blue"

[Quoting from a poem/lyric]
"Whatcha Gonna Do? When The Gang's In Blue?"
[Having come across three kids beaten to death by Moose Tavola]
We've gotta have something we can use against him?

[Reality sinking in]
No all we've got is three dead black kids and the ring pull to a beer can... WE'VE GOT NOTHING!
